verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
My life is in You Lord
My strength is in You Lord
My hope is in You Lord
In You it's in You
My life is in You Lord
My strength is in You Lord
My hope is in You Lord
In You it's in You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will praise You
With all of my life
I will praise You
With all of my strength
With all of my life
With all of my strength
All of my hope is in You

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Is in You
It's in You
In You
